name: Marketpress Count Sales Product
author: Subhash Nagda

sections.description:
You may want to show off your site’s total number of sold product on the front-end of your site. This plugin adds a new shortcode [MPCSP], that will do just that! it also supports multisite.

Example Use:

You want to brag to your customers how much product you’r store has sold . You want to brag to your customers how much product you’r each store has sold
in case of multisite.

The Shortcode: [MPCSP]
sections.installation:
1. Either download the plugin and upload it or search for it under Plugins > Add New. Activate it, too.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the [MPCSP] shortcode in post or pages
  4. Place <?php echo do_shortcode('[MPCSP]'); ?> in your templates
  5. Be awesome!
